fields.title: Groundhog Day
fields.review: "Groundhog Day is more than simply a great comedy - it's a modern metaphor for the path to enlightenment." -Bozdech

fields.title: Inception
fields.review: "Inception is an intriguing, frustrating film, but ultimately satisfying." -Anderson

fields.title: Nightcrawler
fields.review: "Nightcrawler is tense and intense, ferocious and obsessed, and crackles with energy and a dark sense of humor." -McKnight

fields.title: Where The Wild Things Are
fields.review: "A moving, thoughtful look back at a time in our lives when we didn't understand the way the world works." -Harris

fields.title: Juno
fields.review: "Just a lovely, lovely film which asks for nothing." - Ross

fields.title: The Truman Show
fields.review: "The ahead-of-its-time film spoke volumes about everything from politics to the rampant rise of reality TV." -anon

fields.title: Shutter Island
fields.review: "A relentlessly chilling mystery and a white-knuckle thriller." -Massie

fields.title: Meet the Robinsons
fields.review: "With innovation, creativity, and heartfelt storytelling, this is solid entertainment for audiences of all ages." -Massie

fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
fields.review: "Touching, tragic, inspiring, funny, hopeful, and, most importantly, powerfully romantic." -Massie

fields.title: Fury
fields.review: "An impressively solid World War II movie of the kind they don't make anymore." -Rainer
